description.en:
Bayesian models are increasingly being used in science and in solving practical problems where informed decisions and choices need to be made in situations of uncertainty or limited information. The course provides an overview and fundamental practical skills for formulating Bayesian models, fitting them to data, and validating and interpreting results. We focus somewhat less on theoretical nuances and pay more attention to developing practical skills -- which, however, also requires a fundamental understanding of the theory. The course is based to a large extent on independent preparatory work (we mainly rely on Richard McElreath's book "Statistical Rethinking"), in seminars we deal with solving practical tasks in small groups, mainly using the Python package PyMC.

Prerequisites:
Basic knowledge of statistics.
The practical part of the course requires the ability to work in Python. This can also be acquired during the course -- we also offer support and help for this -- but in this case, additional workload must be taken into account.
description.et:
Bayesi mudelid leiavad aina laiemat rakendust nii teaduses kui ka praktiliste probleemide lahendamisel, kus on vaja teha põhjendatud otsuseid ja valikuid ebakindluse või piiratud informatsiooni olukorras. Kursus annab ülevaate ning fundamentaalsed praktilised oskused Bayesi mudelite formuleerimiseks, andmetega sobitamiseks ning tulemuste valideerimiseks ja interpreteerimiseks. Keskendume mõnevõrra vähem teoreetilistele nüanssidele ja pöörame enam tähelepanu praktiliste oskuste arendamisele -- mis küll siiski eeldab ka teooria põhimõttelist mõistmist. Kursus põhineb olulisel määral iseseisval ettevalmistaval tööl (peamiselt toetume Richard McElreathi raamatule "Statistical Rethinking"), seminarides tegeleme väikestes gruppides praktiliste ülesannete lahendamisega, kasutades peamiselt Pythoni paketti PyMC.

Eeldused:
Põhiteadmised statistikast.
Kursuse praktiline osa eeldab võimekust töötada Pythonis. Seda on võimalik omandada ka kursuse käigus -- pakume selleks ka tuge ning abi -- kuid sel puhul tuleb arvestada lisakoormusega.

objectives.en: To provide an overview of the foundations of Bayesian statistics and their practical application.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade Bayesi statistika alustest ning nende praktilisest rakendusest.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completion of the course, students will be able to:
* understand and apply the principles of Bayesian statistics to analyze different types of data
learning_outcomes.et: * mõista ning rakendada Bayesi statistika põhimõtteid eri tüüpi andmete analüüsimisel

learning_outcomes.en: * understand and formulate Bayesian models and work with prior distributions and simulations
learning_outcomes.et: * mõista ning ise formuleerida Bayesi mudeleid ning töötada eeljaotuste ja simulatsioonidega

learning_outcomes.en: * diagnose, compare and validate different Bayesian models
learning_outcomes.et: * diagnoosida, võrrelda ja valideerida erinevaid Bayesi mudeleid

learning_outcomes.en: * fit more complex hierarchical models and correctly interpret their results
learning_outcomes.et: * sobitada ka keerukamaid hierarhilisi mudeleid ning korrektselt interpreteerida nende tulemusi

description.et: Timely submission of homework assigned during the course.
Successful defense of the results of group work.

grade_preconditions.et:
1. Work in seminars:
Active participation in at least 75% of seminars.
Timely submission of homework.
Watching lecture videos.
2. Timely submission and successful defense of the project.
